seo.title: Transport publiczny na Wybrzeżu Amalfitańskim
seo.description: Jak poruszać się bez samochodu: autobusy, promy i pociągi — bilety, rozkłady i sezonowe niuanse.

sections.title: SITA buses
body: Buy tickets at tobacconists/newstands before boarding and validate on the bus.
Expect queues at peak times. Start early and consider a ferry as a crowd bypass.

sections.title: Trains (to gateways)
body: Intercity legs save time on Rome/Naples/Salerno routing; local Circumvesuviana serves Sorrento.

sections.title: Timing & strategy
body: Leave before 09:00 to beat queues; for sunset returns, prefer ferries when seas are calm.
Carry small change for tickets and a hat/water for exposed stops.

faqs.q: Can I bring luggage on buses?
a: Allowed but not ideal at peak; consider ferries or porters for heavy bags.
